name: Tears in Rain: The Last Moments of the Metaverse
name_original: Tears in Rain: The Last Moments of the Metaverse
description:
A journey into the last moments before the sun sets on the final metaverse server. A snapshot of moments to be lost in time. 

A collaborative game created in two(ish) weeks by the students of SAIC's Art Games Class, Fall 2022

Dorothy Childs
Lisette Coles
Ben Glass
Diamond Galindo
Will Grieshaber
Rosie Hart
Jang Su
Joanna Lee
Brandon Morrissette
Asia Rabago
Jay Santamaria
Ricky Zhang
